snippet: Kitakyushu has declared war on the yakuza, just as authorities say any romantic aura that may have enveloped gangsters in the past is falling away in Japanese society.
abstract: Authorities in Kitakyushu, Japan, say that rise of gang violence toward city officials seeking to crack down on the yakuza, Japan's organized crime syndicates, has shocked and disillusioned a public that in past had quietly tolerated the underworld.
lead_paragraph: Kitakyushu has declared war on the yakuza, just as authorities say any romantic aura that may have enveloped gangsters in the past is falling away in Japanese society.

headline.main: With Risk, Japanese City Takes On Once Accepted Fact of Life: Its Gangsters
headline.print_headline: With Risk, Japanese City Takes On a Once-Accepted Fact of Life: Its Gangsters
